Translations.Text: Ara kono manusera'i emana maryada ne'i ye, allah tara sathe katha balabena ohira madhyama chara athaba pardara arala chara athaba emana duta prerana chara, ye duta tamra anumatikrame tini ya cana ta ohi karena, tini sarbocca, hikamata'oyala

Ara ebhabe [1] amara apanara prati amadera nirdesa theke ruhake ohi karechi; apani to janatena na kitaba ki ebam imana ki! Kintu amara etake karechi nura, ya dbara amara amadera bandadera madhye yake icche hedayata dana kari; ara apani to abasya'i sarala pathera dike dikanirdesana karena
se allahara patha, yini asamanasamuha o yamine ya kichu ache tara malika. Jene rakhuna, saba bisaya allahara'i dike phire yabe
Ha - mima
Suspasta kitabera sapatha
niscaya amara etake (abatirna) karechi arabi (bhasaya) kura'ana, yate tomara bujhate para
Ara niscaya ta amadera kache unmula kitabe ucca maryadasampanna, hikamatapurna
Amara ki tomadera theke e upadesabani sampurnarupe pratyahara kare neba e karane ye, tomara simalanghanakari sampradaya
ara purbabatidera kache amara bahu nabi prerana karechilama
Ara yakhana'i tadera kache kono nabi eseche tara take niye thatta-bidrupa kareche
Phale yara edera ceye saktite prabala chila taderake amara dhbansa karechilama; ara gata hayeche purbabartidera anurupa drstanta
Ara apani yadi taderake jijnesa karena, ‘ke asamanasamuha o yamina srsti kareche?’ Tara abasya'i balabe, ‘egulo to srsti karechena parakramasali sarbajna'i.’
Yini tomadera jan'ya yaminake baniyechena sayya [1] ebam tate baniyechena tomadera calara patha [2], yate tomara sathika patha pete para
ara yini asamana theke bari barsana karena parimitabhabe [1]. Atahpara ta dbara amara sanjibita kari nirjiba janapadake. Ebhabe'i tomaderake bera kara habe
Ara yini sakala prakarera jora yugala srsti karechena ebam yini tomadera jan'ya srsti karechena emana nauyana o grhapalita jantu yate tomara arohana kara

yate tomara era pithe sthira haye basate para, tarapara tomadera rabera anugraha smarana karabe yakhana tomara era upara sthira haye basabe ebam balabe [1], ‘pabitra-mahana tini, yini eguloke amadera basibhuta kare diyechena. Ara amara samartha chilama na ederake basibhuta karate
‘Ara niscaya amara amadera rabera kache'i pratyabartanakari.’
Ara tara tamra bandadera madhya theke tamra ansa sabyasta kareche [1]. Niscaya'i manusa spasta akrtajna
Naki tini ya srsti karechena ta hate kan'ya santana grahana karechena ebam tomaderake bisista karechena putra santana dbara
Ara yakhana tadera ka'uke susambada deya haya ya rahamanera prati tara drstanta pesa kare ta dbara, takhana tara mukhamandala malina haye yaya ematabasthaya ye se duhsaha yatanaklista
Ara ye alankare lalita-palita haya ebam se bitarkakale spasta baktabye asamartha se ki? (Allahara jan'ya sabyasta habe)
ara tara rahamanera banda pheresataganake nari ganya kareche; edera srsti ki tara dekhechila? Tadera saksya abasya'i lipibad'dha kara habe ebam taderake jijnesa kara habe
Tara ara'o bale, ‘rahamana icche karale amara edera ibadata karatama na.’ E bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i; tara to sudhu managara katha balache
Naki amara taderake kura'anera age kono kitaba diyechi atahpara tara ta drrhabhabe dharana kare ache
baram tara bale, ‘niscaya amara amadera pitrpurusaderake eka matadarsera upara peyechi ebam niscaya amara tadera padanka anusarane hedayatapraapta haba.’

Ara ebhabe'i apanara purbe kono janapade yakhana'i amara kono satarkakari pathiyechi takhana'i tara bilasapriyara baleche, ‘niscaya amara amadera pitrpurusaderake eka matadarse peyechi ebam amara tadera'i padanka anusarana kare thakaba.’
